socialMessages.whatsapp: Hi! I've just joined {count}+ North Swanage residents fighting against destructive traffic schemes. Our community needs your voice too. Please take 2 minutes to help:

email.subject: Help protect North Swanage from traffic chaos
email.body:
Dear Friend,

I'm writing to ask for your help in protecting North Swanage from poorly conceived traffic schemes.

Over {count} residents have already joined the campaign. Will you add your voice?

It only takes 2 minutes:

testComments: This traffic scheme will negatively impact our community
We need better consultation with residents
The proposed changes don't address the real issues
Please listen to local voices and concerns
Test comment for E2E testing purposes
